I got a bit carried away...\""},{"lineNumber":11703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、ぐう……あ、頭がくらくらしてきた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, guh... Ah, my head is starting to spin...\""},{"lineNumber":11704,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子が去った後で、","translatedEnglishLine":"After Chizuruko left,"},{"lineNumber":11705,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらつきながらランスが出てきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance emerged, staggering."},{"lineNumber":11706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ランス様！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Rance!?\""},{"lineNumber":11707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どちらに行かれてたんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where have you been?\""},{"lineNumber":11708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル…………お前、いいな……その、服……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cil... You look nice... that, uh, outfit...\""},{"lineNumber":11709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、えっ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":11710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　い、いつもと変わりませんけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-It’s the same as usual though...\""},{"lineNumber":11711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、素晴らしいぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's wonderful...\""},{"lineNumber":11712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにせ、俺に攻撃してこないから……な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After all, you don't attack me... you know...\""},{"lineNumber":11713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様！？　ランス様ーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance!? Lord Rance—!\""},{"lineNumber":11714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……あの、私、何すればいいの……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... um, what should I do...?\""},{"lineNumber":11715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　料理なら作るけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can cook, though...\""},{"lineNumber":11716,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、その厨房。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, the kitchen."},{"lineNumber":11717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、いたいた。マルチナ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, there you are, Martina.\""},{"lineNumber":11718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……あ、えーと、総統さん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... Ah, um, Supreme Commander?\""},{"lineNumber":11719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ……って、なんだ。働いてるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... What is this? You're working?\""},{"lineNumber":11720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃね。私、料理人よ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course. I am a cook, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":11721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本来なら、お客様なのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Normally, I'd be a guest here, but...\""},{"lineNumber":11722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よその仕事場に割りこんで悪いとは思ってるけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I feel bad intruding on someone else's workplace,"},{"lineNumber":11723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　料理しないと死んじゃうのよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"but if I don't cook, I'll die.\""},{"lineNumber":11724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……とのことで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So it is.\""},{"lineNumber":11725,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実際、マルチナ様ほどの腕の方が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In fact, someone with Martina-sama's skill"},{"lineNumber":11726,"originalJapaneseLine":"　厨房に入って頂けるのであれば、否はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"joining the kitchen is not something I can refuse.\""},{"lineNumber":11727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":11728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、何か用？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what do you want?\""},{"lineNumber":11729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。セックスしようぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey. Let's have sex!\""},{"lineNumber":11730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":11731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、沈黙は肯定の証。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, silence is proof of consent."},{"lineNumber":11732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よしそうと決まれば――――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, if that's decided――――!\""},{"lineNumber":11733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、嫌に決まってるでしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I mean, obviously no."},{"lineNumber":11734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何のメリットがあるのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"What benefit would there be?\""},{"lineNumber":11735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごく気持ちが良いぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It feels really good."},{"lineNumber":11736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぬるぬるのあへあへだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's all slippery and ecstasy.\""},{"lineNumber":11737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お断り。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I refuse."},{"lineNumber":11738,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな事してる暇はないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't have time for that.\""},{"lineNumber":11739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「楽しいぞ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fun, you know?"},{"lineNumber":11740,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それにこの総統様が色々いい目も見せてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, this Supreme Commander will show you many good things.\""},{"lineNumber":11741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「料理以上の快楽はないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is no pleasure greater than cooking."},{"lineNumber":11742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほらほら、塩撒かれる前に帰った帰った」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, before you get salted, go on home.\""},{"lineNumber":11743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっととと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, whoa, whoa."},{"lineNumber":11744,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……仕方ないな。本題は後の課題として、","translatedEnglishLine":"...It can't be helped. Let's leave the main issue for later,"},{"lineNumber":11745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サブの用件を片付けるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"and take care of this side matter first.\""},{"lineNumber":11746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まだあるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There's still more?\""},{"lineNumber":11747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、こいつだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, this one.\""},{"lineNumber":11748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えぇと、こんにちは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um, hello...\""},{"lineNumber":11749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいこんにちは。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello."},{"lineNumber":11750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えぇと、総統さんの奥さんだっけ","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, are you the Supreme Commander's wife?\""},{"lineNumber":11751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっがーーーう！　奴隷だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Noooo! She's a slave!\""},{"lineNumber":11752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":11753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺の身の回りの世話をさせてやってるのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have her take care of my personal needs."},{"lineNumber":11754,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、こいつに料理を仕込んでみてくれんか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, could you try teaching her how to cook?\""},{"lineNumber":11755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………料理を？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Cooking?\""},{"lineNumber":11756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ。君、名手なのだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. You're a master, right?\""},{"lineNumber":11757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":11758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええと…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um...\""},{"lineNumber":11759,"originalJapaneseLine":"マルチナはシィルの姿を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Martina carefully looked over Cil from head to toe."},{"lineNumber":11760,"originalJapaneseLine":"上から下までしげしげと眺めた。","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは乱反射する光にやられ続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance kept being affected by the scattered reflections of light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅ……少し熱中しちゃったわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I got a bit carried away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、ぐう……あ、頭がくらくらしてきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, guh... Ah, my head is starting to spin..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらつきながらランスが出てきた。
どちらに行かれてたんですか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cil... You look nice... that, uh, outfit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: い、いつもと変わりませんけど……」
なにせ、俺に攻撃してこないから……な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, you don't attack me... you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様！？　ランス様ーー！」
「うむうむ……って、なんだ。働いてるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, um... What is this? You're working?"
"Of course. I am a cook, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本来なら、お客様なのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Normally, I'd be a guest here, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よその仕事場に割りこんで悪いとは思ってるけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel bad intruding on someone else's workplace,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 料理しないと死んじゃうのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if I don't cook, I'll die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際、マルチナ様ほどの腕の方が
厨房に入って頂けるのであれば、否はありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: joining the kitchen is not something I can refuse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、嫌に決まってるでしょ。
何のメリットがあるのよ」
ぬるぬるのあへあへだ」
そんな事してる暇はないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't have time for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにこの総統様が色々いい目も見せてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, this Supreme Commander will show you many good things."
"There is no pleasure greater than cooking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほらほら、塩撒かれる前に帰った帰った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, before you get salted, go on home."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……仕方ないな。本題は後の課題として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It can't be helped. Let's leave the main issue for later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サブの用件を片付けるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and take care of this side matter first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えぇと、総統さんの奥さんだっけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, are you the Supreme Commander's wife?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっがーーーう！　奴隷だ！」
「俺の身の回りの世話をさせてやってるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have her take care of my personal needs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、こいつに料理を仕込んでみてくれんか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, could you try teaching her how to cook?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルチナはシィルの姿を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina carefully looked over Cil from head to toe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上から下までしげしげと眺めた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

どちらに行かれてたんですか？」

なにせ、俺に攻撃してこないから……な……」

"Of course. I am a cook, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本来なら、お客様なのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Normally, I'd be a guest here, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よその仕事場に割りこんで悪いとは思ってるけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel bad intruding on someone else's workplace,

厨房に入って頂けるのであれば、否はありません」

ぬるぬるのあへあへだ」
